attributes.title: This app gave me issue.
attributes.review:

Much to my dismay, I began to feel sick and weak. Although I had been out at bars these last few weekends, I am almost certain that this was a direct effect of the 5G radiation taking itâ€™s course. I began to contract flu-like symptoms, I had a terrible cough, and I couldnâ€™t taste or smell anything!!! It was awful, but like any good Christian American; I put my faith in the lord, wrapped my tinfoil hat on tight, and kept using this app for my valiant President! A few weeks have gone by since then and I am now completely bald.  The app has major bugs and Iâ€™ve developed a cyst the size of a grapefruit. My motor skills have suffered and I have lost the ability to decipher when someone is using basic empathy or common sense. Along with a mole that looks strangely like our last good president Ronald Reagan. I must delete this app, because the health risk, and give it one star as a result.

attributes.title: no, you cannot have my number
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show loyalty to the president because no matter what my beliefs are, heâ€™s still my president and i have to respect him. when I downloaded the app, it immediately asked for my phone number and I couldnâ€™t bypass it. this isnâ€™t that weird, however, right after i put my number in I received a phone call from a restricted number. It was heavy breathing for a few seconds before a man started whimpering things like â€œtell me iâ€™m a good boyâ€ and â€œmistress may i make america great again?â€  and â€œI promise iâ€™ve been a good little president.â€ I hung up, but you canâ€™t block restricted numbers. I received 36 more calls like this. Then i started receiving envelopes with photos of me in them and the words â€œtell me iâ€™m a good boyâ€ written on them. I felt like i was being followed. It got to the point where i had to change my number, my address, and even my name. I live off the grid now and i only came back to modern technology to warn people not to download this app!!! It ruined my LIFE. I can never see my friends or family ever again, simply because i put my phone number down.

It was highly embarrassing not to mention the crusty Cheeto finger prints Iâ€™ve been finding all over my clothes and I can tell itâ€™s the low-fat off brand ones, with all the money our â€œleaderâ€ is putting into building a wall, youâ€™d think weâ€™d have enough cash laying around to splurge a little and buy the good ones. attributes.title: Gave me a strokeğŸ˜
attributes.review: I downloaded this app wanting nothing more than to support my incredible! Accepting! Inclusive! Powerful president. Although after downloading the app my entire phone began flashing with a strobe light effect. I immediately threw down my phone in horror. I look up at my television and my living room tv was doing the same thing! Through the lights I could see a faint image of a familiar show- Fox News. My absolute favorite news source. After focusing for too long on my beloved anchors, I began to lose function of my body and thoughts. Before losing consciousness the sentence â€œif we stop testing for coronavirus weâ€™ll have less casesâ€ kept playing in the background. What a way to go out! Such insight! Anyways I hope they fix this app but Iâ€™m currently in the hospital racking up thousands by the minute because affordable healthcare is considered a â€œhand outâ€ in this country. KEEP AMERICA BRAIN DEAD!
